name: DeliveryMan
description:
Deliveryman is an endless runner made for Brackeys 2022.1 game jam.

You have to deliver orders as fast as possible before the time runs out. Beware of stepping on civilians and false orders!

This game was developed in unity, the programming was in charge of Matias Garcia, while the art was in charge of Candela Giordano. Finally the music was taken from www.zapsplat.com
